Labjack T7¶

class labjackT7.LabJack(device='ANY', connection='ANY', devid='ANY', arange=10)¶

Bases: archetypes.parallel.ProcessHandler

Python interface for the LabJack T7.

AIn(channel, num=1)¶

Read the specified channel. If num>1, multiple measurements are performed and averaged.

AOut(channel, value, HV=False)¶

Output value (0-5V) on the specified channel. The HV flag allows the LJTick-DAC addon board to be used to generate +/-10V.

PWM(channel, frequency, duty_cycle)¶

Pulse width modulation on a channel (0 or 2-5) at a given frequency in Hz and duty cycle (0-1).

__init__(device='ANY', connection='ANY', devid='ANY', arange=10)¶

Attempt to connect to the LabJack specified by device, connection, and devid args.

_command(register, value)¶

Writes a value to a specified register.

_connect()¶
spi_initialize(mode=3, CLK=0, CS=1, MOSI=2, MISO=3)¶

Args: int CS: the channel to use as chip select int CLK: the channel to use as the clock int MISO: the channel to use for input int MOSI: the channel to use for output

spi_write(data)¶

Writes a list of commands via SPI.

stream_out(channel, data, loop=False)¶

Streams data out on channel 0 or 1 (DAC0 or DAC1).
